text: Pertwee is a surname. People with this name include: ==Pertwee family of English actors/writers== *Roland Pertwee (1885-1963), English writer and actor, father of Jon and Michael and uncle of Bill *Michael Pertwee (1916-1991), English playwright *Jon Pertwee (1919-1996), English actor best known as Doctor Who, father of Sean *Bill Pertwee (1926-2013), English actor best known as the ARP Warden in Dad's Army *Sean Pertwee (born 1964), English actor Category:English-language surnames Category:Surnames of English origin
title: Pertwee
